nodes.text: Chancellor Palpatine award for Clarity in Crisis

The Chancellor Palpatine award for Clarity in Crisis was an award bestowed by Supreme Chancellor Sheev Palpatine of the Galactic Republic. Hamma Elad, an artist and leading member of the Commission for the Protection of the Republic during the Clone Wars, was a three-time recipient of the award.

The Chancellor Palpatine award for Clarity in Crisis was first mentioned in the book Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy, written by Pablo Hidalgo and released on October 25, 2016.
